wikipedia_page.main: William Clark (25 February 1932 – 27 July 2006) was a Scottish footballer, who played in the Scottish League for Arbroath and Berwick Rangers and in the English Football League for Queens Park Rangers.

response: *Willie Clark (footballer, born 1918) (1918–2008), Scottish football (soccer) player (Hibernian, St. Johnstone)
*Willie Clark (ice hockey) (born 1931), British ice hockey player
*Willie Clarke (songwriter), co-founder of Miami's first Black-owned record label
